# hw_bag (Resource)

Mock bag resource for instructional purposes. Can contain multiple sandwiches.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `sandwich_ids` (List of String) List of sandwich resource IDs to include in the bag

### Optional

- `description` (String) A description of the bag resource

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Bag identifier
